original_text: These cities each had its pasturelands around it. So it was with all these cities.
korean_text: 이 각 성읍의 주위에 목초지가 있었고 모든 성읍이 다 그러하였더라

sentences.original_text: These cities each had its pasturelands around it.
sentences.korean_translation: 이 도시들은 각각 주위에 목초지를 가지고 있었다.

sentences.original_text: So it was with all these cities.
